en: Bless Jehovah, O my soul; And all that is within me, bless his holy name.
hmr: Aw ka hringna, LALPA chu inpâk la, Ka sûnga um po pohai, a hming inthieng chu inpâk ro.

en: Bless Jehovah, O my soul, And forget not all his benefits:
hmr: Aw ka hringna, LALPA chu inpâk la, A thilthaw ṭhat po po chu theinghil naw.

en: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; Who healeth all thy diseases;
hmr: Ama chun i rîtlona po po a ngaidam hlak a, I natna po po a sukdam hlak.

en: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; Who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;
hmr: Bohmangnaa inthawkin i hringna chu ân tlan hlak a, Zainêmna le lainatnahai ân khumtir hlak cheh a.

en: Who satisfieth thy desire with good things, So that thy youth is renewed like the eagle.
hmr: I bau chu thil ṭhain a sukkhawp hlak a; chuongchun, i tleirâwlna chu mupui anga siemtharin a um nâwk hlak.

en: Jehovah executeth righteous acts, And judgments for all that are oppressed.
hmr: LALPA chun nêksâwrna tuorhai po po ta dingin, Thil felhai thawpêkin, rohai a rêlpêk hlak.

en: He made known his ways unto Moses, His doings unto the children of Israel.
hmr: A lampuihai chu Mosie ân hriettir a, A thil thawhai chu Israel thlahai ân hriettir bawk a.

en: Jehovah is merciful and gracious, Slow to anger, and abundant in lovingkindness.
hmr: LALPA chu lainatnaa sip, mi lunginsiet theitak, Lunginuoitak, ngilneina hautak a nih.

en: He will not always chide; Neither will he keep his anger for ever.
hmr: Ama chun hal rawp naw ni a, A lungsen chu vawng kumkhuo naw ni.

en: He hath not dealt with us after our sins, Nor rewarded us after our iniquities.
hmr: Ei suolnahai angin ei chungah a thaw nawh a, Ei rîtlona angin a mi thung bawk nawh.

en: For as the heavens are high above the earth, So great is his lovingkindness toward them that fear him.
hmr: Vân khi hnuoi chung insângtaka a um angin, Ama ṭituhai chungah a ngilneina chu a nasa a nih.

en: As far as the east is from the west, So far hath he removed our transgressions from us.
hmr: Sak le thlang ân hlat angin, Ei bawsietnahai chu ei kuoma inthawkin a sie hmang dai tah a.

en: Like as a father pitieth his children, So Jehovah pitieth them that fear him.
hmr: Pain a nauhai a lunginsiet ang hin, LALPA chun ama ṭituhai chu a lunginsiet hlak.

en: For he knoweth our frame; He remembereth that we are dust.
hmr: Ei taksa siem dân hi a hriet a, Pilvut el ei nih ti a hriet zing leiin.

en: As for man, his days are as grass; As a flower of the field, so he flourisheth.
hmr: Mihriem chu, a dam sûng nihai chu hlobet ang a na, Phûl pâr ang hin a vul hlak a.

en: For the wind passeth over it, and it is gone; And the place thereof shall know it no more.
hmr: Thliin a mût a, a bo hlak a nih, A umna chun hre nâwk ta naw nih.

en: But the lovingkindness of Jehovah is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, And his righteousness unto children’s children;
hmr: LALPA zainêmna ruok chu a ṭituhai chunga chun chatuona inthawka chatuon chenin um a ta, A felna khawm an thlahai thlahai chenin;

en: To such as keep his covenant, And to those that remember his precepts to do them.
hmr: A thuthlung zâwm taphawt le, A thuhrilhai awi tuma hre zinghai taphawt chunga chun.

en: Jehovah hath established his throne in the heavens; And his kingdom ruleth over all.
hmr: LALPA chun a lalṭhungpha chu vâna khin a sukdet a, A ram chun iengkim chungah ro a rêl a.

en: Bless Jehovah, ye his angels, That are mighty in strength, that fulfil his word, Hearkening unto the voice of his word.
hmr: A vântirkohai, a thu ngaia, a thu zâwma, hrâtnaa ropui hlakhai, LALPA chu inpâk ro.

en: Bless Jehovah, all ye his hosts, Ye ministers of his, that do his pleasure.
hmr: A sipaihai, LALPA chu inpâk ro, A dit zâwng thawh a, a rawng bâwltuhai,

en: Bless Jehovah, all ye his works, In all places of his dominion: Bless Jehovah, O my soul.
hmr: A rorêlna hmun po poa a thilthaw po pohai, LALPA chu inpâk ro: Aw Ka hringna, LALPA chu inpâk rawh.
